# ctfd Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "ctfd" {
  username = "admin"
  password = "admin"
  url      = "http://0.0.0.0:8000/"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **password** (String) Admin. password
- **username** (String) Admin. username

### Optional

- **url** (String) Base URL of CTFd instance
